data.text: @DMcGachey Wait, did the Vercotti brothers predate Gotti? That's pretty prescient.

@SquidyUK Vercotti. The new biopic of an Anglo-Italian who gains infamy in the 1970s and joins a powerful, secretive organisation, called 'the organisation'... then another organisation called 'the other organisation'... "Guaranteed to break your legs at parties" - The Stage.
